jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
A scarab scuttles across the frame as the woman looks over the bed
Brief flashes to a car while Elvis is in bed
Scarab jumps suddenly at Elvis
Scarab jumps out of the bowl
Several cuts to photos as Elvis enters the room accompanied by a sound effect
Elvis is woken up by a hand grabbing him with a sound effect
The nurse turns and a man in standing right behind her
Bubba Ho-Tep attacks Elvis from behind the tree
Bubba Ho-Tep steps into frame

movies.title: Butcher, Baker, Nightmare Maker / Night Warning

jump_scares.spoiler: Julia jumps out at Billy from behind a hallway and snaps a photo with her camera
A balloon suddenly explodes
As Detective Carlson enters the kitchen, Aunt Cheryl jumps out at him from the side
While walking away from the house, Julia is grabbed by the detective hiding behind some bushes
Aunt Cheryl runs into the kitchen shouting from the porch door while Julia is looking around
As Margie looks around, there is a cut to Aunt Cheryl watching her from the bushes
Aunt Cheryl suddenly jumps back up from the ground behind Billy
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera
The child eater jumps out at the officer Wesley from the corner of the room
Ginger runs at officer Casey from behind and hits him with a shotgun
The child eater suddenly appears in the reflection of the mirror and attacks Ginger
As Lucas walks down a hallway, there is a sudden cut to the child eater, accompanied by a lound sound
Lucas points his flashlight at a corner and the child eater jumps out from behind it
Lucas turns around and the child eater crawls out from behind a corner in front of him
Helen picks up a seemingly dead Ginger’s glass eye, and Ginger grabs her by the arm
Helen kneels down and the child eater is standing right behind her
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
While climbing down a cube hatch, Cassandra is suddenly grabbed on the leg
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
The little girl turns to face the side while on the ground and a corpse with gouged out eyes is right in front of her
When the lights go out while Som is banging on the door, it suddenly opens
Shane looks up and sees someone standing behind a transcluent curtain
Shane leans forwards to pick up the watch he dropped, revealing the ghost woman sitting in the seat right next to his
Shane forces the elevator door open, followed by a cut to the ghost woman right outside jumping at him
A ghostified looking Som lunges at Shane from the darkness
While Shane is standing on top of a cardboard cut-out of the ghost, it suddenly turns into the real ghost when he looks down at it
While the ghost woman is slowly approaching Shane from behind, when he turns around she moves right in front of the camera
While Shane is running the ghost woman suddenly appears in front of him and attacks with a knife
The screen fades to black, and a few seconds later there is a cut to the ghost woman on the film’s poster
The credits begin to roll over a still frame of the woman hanging, but she suddenly springs back upwards a few seconds later and looks at the camera
A worm-like mouth flies at Layla’s eye while she is peeping through the hole
Hermann is hit on the head after the hole says “Remember, that was your dream.
The kid’s toy begins to yell in an adult voice
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A hand reaches out and grabs Jesse’s walkie talkie which is lying on the ground
A shadow passes by the window
Adam calls out for Paul to stop the car as her sees something in the woods
Something hits the light behind Paul causing it to shatter
Something moves away as Paul shines his torch on some hay bales
A creature passes in front of the police car
A creature moves quickly past the camera
Jim puts his hand on Paul’s shoulder
Something moves quickly across the screen on the camera footage
Something bangs on the outside of the house
The creature knocks over Donny as he runs to the house
A loud bang startles the occupants of the church
Some chairs fall to the floor
The creature grabs Donny
A light falls to the ground and breaks. A few seconds later the creature drops from the ceiling and reveals itself
A creature turns around and lunges at the camera
Clint looks down from the sky and sees the monster standing right behind Adam
Clint looks up to see Adam trapped in a cage of antlers
Will turns on the camera light and a monster is standing right in front of him
There is suddenly a loud bang in the middle of a conversation
Adam grabs his boot from the grave and stands up to reveal Dekker standing right behind him
While Adam and Dekker are arguing, Will points the camera downwards and a monster runs straight at him
There is suddenly an incredibly loud screech that wakes up Adam and his wife
A clown doll falls from the ceiling with a loud horn
A skeleton reaches through a break in the wall
The female skeleton slams into the chain fence nd starts screaming

A woman starts banging on the car door and screaming
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
There is a sudden noise in the distance
As the group look around the room with a flashlight, there is suddenly a cut to a creepy old man behind some shelves who turns at the camera with a sound cue
Paulina leans in towards the seemingly dead creepy old man, who suddenly grabs her the shoulder
A sudden, very loud noise scares the entire group
Claire approaches Dave in bed before disappearing. When, Dave turns around, she is right in front of his face
While walking backwards, Alan runs into the creepy old man
The soldier touches the seemingly dead man with a knife, and he springs back up
Alan turns around, shining the light on the creepy old man who is standing right in front of him
As Paulina slowly reaches out for her son’s shoulder, he quickly turns around
The son runs at Paulina, briefly going out of frame. When he reappears, his face shifts and he begins attacking Paulina
There is a sudden earthquake
A closet door closes on its own, revealing Claire with a knife behind it
Claire appears on screen and screams as she attacks the camera
A sudden scream is heard in the distance
As Tyler and Paulina walk into the dark corridor, there is a gasping sound right in front of them
The camera’s night vision shows a woman right in front of Tyler and Paulina who looks up at the camera and screams
The water begins to bubble, scaring Paulina
Paulina looks up from the ground and sees her son right in front of her, who then screams
Paulina stands up, and there is a rotting corpse right in front of her face
Paulina looks down from the ceiling with the flashlight and shines it on Pepe
A bloody man runs towards the camera. Footage from original film
A person appears in the mirror
A bloody man is on the ceiling. Footage from the original film
A man bloody man jumps out of the bathtub. Footage from original film

A loud bang
The furniture in the room gets flipped over

A loud noise is heard
A childs face distorts and screams

A loud noise is heard
The security guard wakes up

A man runs at the thermal camera

A loud bang is heard
A light suddenly switches on

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
Frank turns around and a door window shatters
The lights suddenly come on and a man jumps out from behind a box
Frank turns to his left and sees a man running at him
Accompanied by a high pitched noise, the lamp flickers and the scene abruptly changes
There is a sudden scene change to a man attacking a woman
There is another abrupt scene change
A loud scream can be heard
A torch shines on Susan as she walks towards the camera with an unnaturally wide smile on her face, as she gets closer her face suddenly appears directly in front of the camera. [Video]
A crack of thunder may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt cut to a man hitting a woman
Nikki shoots “The Phantom” several times, his face is then replaced with a disturbing image of Nikki’s own face. [Video]
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
During a very tense scene, Angela slowly approaches three mannequins by a window when one of them makes a hissing noise and briefly transforms into a person
An old man walks around the corner startling Jackson
During a tense scene, Angela turns around to see Elliot right beside her
A girl runs past the screen in the foreground
After Jackson says “Beth” one of the young girls appears in front of Jackson and Angela
Beth’s bloodied body appears by the window
A figure moves past the screen in front of Angela
A hand is placed on Angela’s shoulder
A strange girl tapping on a window may startle some viewers
A man in a sleeping bag yells out as Mike shines his torch on him
The girl bangs her hand on the glass door
Asakawa suddenly jumps up from the table in anger
A shadow person runs towards the camera. (It is visible from a second or so beforehand, but viewers who do not spot it may be be startled when it makes a more clear appearance.
A friend of the librarian jumps at her from behind as a joke
The librarian opens her eyes to see a shadow person standing behind the shower curtain
The librarian looks out to the hallway to see a shadow person standing around a corner
Charlie looks at the turned off TV and sees the reflection of a shadow person right next to him
Charlie turns around to see if there’s anyone there, but doesn’t see anything. He turns back to the TV, staring at it for a few seconds when a shadow behind him suddenly moves very quickly
A shadow person runs across the hallway
The camera pans back to the hallway to reveal a man standing right there, and he jumps at the camera
The shadow person suddenly opens its mouth and lunges at the camera
In a mid-credits scene, Preston’s shadow begins to move on its own. After a few seconds of slow build up of an arm morphing out of the shadow, it suddenly grabs him
A loud buzzing noise wakes everyone up
Britton pulls the front door curtain, and a wolf-like creature jumps at the window
Cameron walks towards the corner of the attic and a bat flies out at him
The lights turn back on and a tall monster is standing right in front of the camera
The wolf creature walks away as Cameron gets closer to the car window. Suddenly, it runs back to the car and hits it
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him

During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck

There is some loud inaudible talking just before Amelia wakes up
The Babadook stretches out his arms
A hat falls down into the fireplace
Amelia screams loudly at Sam
There is a loud roaring noise as something approaches Amelia
The scene jump cuts from Vicki practicing her gun shooting skills to a champagne bottle popping and the sorority girls screaming in excitement
Mrs. Slater’s scares Vicki and her boyfriend making out and uses her cane to slashes the waterbed

As Stevie steadies the swinging lightbulb a hand grab her neck and forces her against the wall
Diane frightens Jeanie in the garden looking for Mrs. Slater
The attic door in the ceiling opens and Morgan screams as the camera rushes towards her
As the Jack-in-the-Box stops spinning the killer runs Mrs. Slater’s cane through her back

Diane jumps when an object falls from the van’s dashboard
A hand and Mrs. Slater’s cane come in through the van’s sunroof and attack Diane
Discovering Liz dead in the van, Vicki turns around terrified to see a figure wielding Mrs. Slater’s cane
The murder in the clown mask opens his eyes, and the movie ends
A scary face flashes up on a laptop screen. [Video]
Luke starts talking behind Claire while she is looking through window
A bird flies out at Claire while she is opening a door
Piano keys start to play by themselves. [Video]
Dead lady in wedding dress appears beside Laura while she is in bed
Claire runs into Luke as she comes down the stairs
A beer can falls down the basement steps, followed by the appearance of the old man from the bathtub standing behind Claire

The door to one of the inn’s rooms closes suddenly
Lindsay opens he curtain to reveal Heiter standing there with a gun
During a tense scene Lindsay accidentally kicks a metallic object lying on the ground
Katsuro suddenly stabs Heiter in the foot
Kranz hears a loud gunshot coming from somewhere in the house

After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man

The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot

Michael suddenly jolts awake
The medium suddenly grabs Michael and there is a burst of static
Michael suddenly screams as the footage distorts and we get another burst of static
The footage cuts to a close up of a stereo accompanied by a loud static noise
During Michael’s hypnotism, everything goes quiet briefly before Michael suddenly appears standing directly in front of the camera
A bird flies into the window
Ellie’s toy makes a noise from behind Michael
A trashcan falls over making a loud noise
Michael in the television footage suddenly turns and looks at the real Michael and once again this is accompanied by a static sound effect
Michael opens a drawer to reveal a bloodied knife and a static sound effect plays once more
Something sparks in the background after Michael says “Why are you doing this?
The book Michael is reading from is suddenly thrown away by an unseen force
Michael violently spasms several times as he lies handcuffed to the bed
As Michael reaches for the phone of the floor, a bloodied hand hangs down from the ceiling
Michael headbutts the mirror
The plug holding the hairdryer explodes
After Michael jumps out of the house, we see Michael lying motionless on the ground for several seconds before we hear a thudding noise and the camera moves slightly
As Samantha bends down to pick up the coin, a car slams into her
Loud music begins playing as a girl tries to sleep
A chandelier falls from the ceiling
Something appears to fly off the heater in the corner of the room, causing a woman to scream

There is a high pitched noise and the camera falls to the ground

There are several loud bangs on the door
There is a loud crash
Chrissy bumps into Brian

Chrissy is pulled into the air by an invisible force

A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open

The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out

The curtain suddenly flies up by itself
There is a sudden cut to a creepy mannequin sitting on a chair with a loud sound cue
The mannequin opens its arms and springs forward towards the camera
The killer steps in front of Molly from the side accompanied by a sound cue

Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
Hank suddenly shouts “I’m sorry.” While not a jump scare, it is sudden and extremely loud, enough to clip the microphone
